summary: This is a tweaked injFX_Settings.h file, made for replacing the original provided with some_dude's FXAA Post Process Injector.
descriptionHtml:
Edit: Added a new file which contains shaders, d3d9.dll and the settings file. This should work fine now for those who had it crash on their system before.

This is a tweaked injFX_Settings.h file, made for replacing the original provided with some_dude's FXAA Post Process Injector. This brings out the colours in Skyrim, colds look cold and warms look much warmer. Insides of buildings look very cosy and the whole experience is a lot sharper.

These are just what I use though, if you don't like them, don't use it :P

Youtube video showing settings:
[center][youtube]0ZCmO7BWCnA[/youtube][/center]

some_dude's original:
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=131

Installation: Simply extract into your SKYRIM root folder, which should be
Steam\steamapps\common\Skyrim

[center]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72822/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/6hTry9d.png[/img]
